alert.note: Alert for Clay; Leslie; Owsley; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Owsley, northwestern Leslie, northwestern Perry, southwestern Breathitt and eastern Clay Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 442 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Newfound to Pigeonroost. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mistletoe, Cottongin, Seth and Morris Fork around 450 PM EDT. House, Park Valley, Jonsee, Bluehole and Valjean around 455 PM EDT. Barcreek and Dalesburg around 500 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Whoopflarea, Boho, Spurlock, Hector, Brutus, Buckhorn, Panco, Saul, Goose Rock, Botto, Sizerock, Lipps, Jacks Creek, Plank and Enline. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
